title: Última Saudade - Ao Vivo
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eu admiro cê mandar essa mensagem
lines.translation: I admire you for sending this message.
lines.grammar: admiro (1sg present), mandar; watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'I admire you for sending this message.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Tem que ter cara pra falar o que cê falou
lines.translation: You have to have guts to say what you said.
lines.grammar: ter, falar, falou (common past ending); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'You have to have guts to say what you said.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Tem que ter peito pra achar que tem direito
lines.translation: You have to have guts to think you have a right.
lines.grammar: ter, peito (1sg present), achar; watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'You have to have guts to think you have a right.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: De começar uma conversa me chamando de amor
lines.translation: To start a conversation by calling me "love".
lines.grammar: começar, chamando (1sg present); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'To start a conversation by calling me "love".'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Cê tá achando que minha vida é um filme
lines.translation: You think my life is a movie?
lines.grammar: achando (1sg present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'You think my life is a movie?'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que pausa e depois volta de onde parou?
lines.translation: What pause, and then what if we pick up where we left off?
lines.grammar: depois, parou (common past ending); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'What pause, and then what if we pick up where we left off?'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: O relógio roda igual pra todo mundo
lines.translation: The clock runs the same for everyone.
lines.grammar: relógio (1sg present), todo (1sg present), mundo (1sg present); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'The clock runs the same for everyone.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E numa dessas rodadas você rodou
lines.translation: And in one of those rounds you were eliminated.
lines.grammar: dessas (2sg present), rodadas (2sg present), rodou (common past ending); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'And in one of those rounds you were eliminated.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E cê nem reparou
lines.translation: And you didn't even notice.
lines.grammar: reparou (common past ending); watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'And you didn't even notice.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: No quê?
lines.translation: In what?
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'In what?'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que se eu ligar pra minha última saudade
lines.translation: What if I call my last longing?
lines.grammar: ligar; watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'What if I call my last longing?'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Seu telefone não toca
lines.translation: Your phone isn't ringing.
lines.grammar: watch case/contracao after prepositions; Meaning: 'Your phone isn't ringing.'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Já tem uns três, quatro amores na frente
lines.translation: She already has three or four loves ahead of her.

lines.translation: With priority return
lines.grammar: com (with); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das); Meaning: 'With priority return'; Conjugations carry person/tense; contractions with articles are common; clitic pronouns may attach.
